org.apache.juneau.rest.config

Interface BasicUniversalJenaConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BasicUniversalConfig, DefaultConfig, DefaultHtmlConfig
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomFeedResource, DtoExamples, JsonSchemaResource, RootResources

    public interface BasicUniversalJenaConfig
extends BasicUniversalConfig
    Identical to BasicUniversalConfig but includes RDF marshalling support.

    Default settings defined:

    • Rest:
      • serializers:
        • HtmlDocSerializer
        • HtmlStrippedDocSerializer
        • HtmlSchemaDocSerializer
        • JsonSerializer
        • SimpleJsonSerializer
        • JsonSchemaSerializer
        • XmlDocSerializer
        • UonSerializer
        • UrlEncodingSerializer
        • OpenApiSerializer
        • MsgPackSerializer
        • SoapXmlSerializer
        • PlainTextSerializer
        • RdfXmlSerializer
        • RdfXmlAbbrevSerializer
        • TurtleSerializer
        • NTripleSerializer
        • N3Serializer
      • parsers:
        • JsonParser
        • SimpleJsonParser
        • XmlParser
        • HtmlParser
        • UonParser
        • UrlEncodingParser
        • OpenApiParser
        • MsgPackParser
        • PlainTextParser
        • RdfXmlParser
        • TurtleParser
        • NTripleParser
        • N3Parser
      • config: "$S{juneau.configFile,SYSTEM_DEFAULT}"
    • BeanConfig:
      • ignoreUnknownBeanProperties: "true"
    • SerializerConfig:
      • uriResolution: "ROOT_RELATIVE"
    • HtmlDocConfig:
      • header: "<h1>$RS{title}</h1><h2>$RS{operationSummary,description}</h2>$C{REST/header}"
      • navlinks: "up: request:/.."
      • stylesheet: "$C{REST/theme,servlet:/htdocs/themes/devops.css}"
      • head: "$C{REST/head}"
      • footer: "$C{REST/footer}"
      • nowrap: "true"

    This annotation can be applied to REST resource classes to define common default configurations:

    // Used on a top-level resource. @Rest public class MyResource extends RestServlet implements BasicUniversalJenaConfig { ... }

    // Used on a child resource. @Rest public class MyResource extends RestObject implements BasicUniversalJenaConfig { ... }

    Note that the framework will aggregate annotations defined on all classes in the class hierarchy with values defined on child classes overriding values defined on parent classes. That allows any values defined on this interface to be overridden by annotations defined on the implemented class.

      • BasicRestServlet
      • BasicRestServletGroup
      • BasicRestObject
      • BasicRestObjectGroup
